com.abiquo.abicloud.plugin
Class HypervisorManager

java.lang.Object
  com.abiquo.abicloud.plugin.HypervisorManager

public class HypervisorManager
extends java.lang.Object

Maintain Hypervisor's plugins. It loads from package "com.abiquo.abicloud.plugin.impl" (by default, can add more paths where look up) all the classes implementing IHypervisor interface, only one implementation class allowed for each HypervisorType. Requires on the implementation class a default empty constructor (reflection instantiation). TODO: allow URI paths / java sources (resolving dependences ï¿½bcel/maven?)

Constructor Detail

HypervisorManager

public HypervisorManager()
Creates a new Plugin Manager and load all IHypervisor implementations located at package "com.abiquo.abicloud.plugin.impl"

Method Detail

getHypervisorTypes

public java.lang.String[] getHypervisorTypes()
Enumerates all the available hypervisors types. No multiple implementations of the same hypervisor type allowed.

Returns:
a list containing all IHypervisor.getHypervisorTyper() for each IHypervisor implementation. getHypervisorType is the IHypervisor identifier, so MUST be different for each class.
See Also:
IHypervisor.getHypervisorType()

getAllHypervisors

public java.util.List<IHypervisor> getAllHypervisors(java.lang.String type)
                                              throws HypervisorException
Returns an Hypervisor singleton instance by its type.

Parameters:
type - the desired hypervisor type
Returns:
a singleton instance for the IHypervisor implementation for given hypervisor type.
Throws:
PluginException - if there is not an implementation class for this hypervisor type
HypervisorException

getHypervisor

public IHypervisor getHypervisor(java.lang.String type,
                                 java.net.URL address)
                          throws PluginException
Gets the singleton instance . Or creates a new instance.

Throws:
PluginException

refreshHypervisorPlugins

public void refreshHypervisorPlugins()
Cleans up the existing IHypervisors plugin implementation classes and start search on all given paths (pluginClassPaths) look up for new IHypervisor implementations.

getPluginClassPaths

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPluginClassPaths()
Returns:
a list containing all the class paths where plugins are look up.

addPluginClassPath

public boolean addPluginClassPath(java.lang.String path,
                                  boolean isHighPriority)
Adds the given path at the end of pluginClassPaths. Remember only one instance allowed for each hypervisor type, so if some class already implements a plugin before (find on previous class paths) it will throw a PluginException when try to load from the new path .

Parameters:
path - the new path where to look up for IHypervisor implementations.
isHighPriority - if true, will find first on this class path, otherwise will look up on it before all others.
Returns:
true if the given path are not already on the list, exist and it could be accessible, false otherwise.

removePluginClassPath

public boolean removePluginClassPath(java.lang.String path)
Deletes the given IHypervisor class path

Parameters:
path - the IHypervisor class path to want to remove.
Returns:
true if success remove an existing IHypervisor class path,false if already do not exist.

getHypervisorMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<? extends IHypervisor>> getHypervisorMap()
Gets the current plugin index.

Returns:
all the Hypervisors plugin class implementations indexed by its hypervisor type.

addHypervisorClass

public boolean addHypervisorClass(java.lang.Class<? extends IHypervisor> hyperClass,
                                  boolean update)
                           throws PluginException
Adds a new IHypervisor class implementation indexed by its getHypervisorType.

Parameters:
hypervisorClass - the IHypervisor implementation class want to add.
update - require to overwrite already defined implementation class.
Returns:
true if success add the new IHypervisor class, false if update is not required and some IHypervisor class already defined for the same hypervisor type.
Throws:
PluginException - if the given class can not no be instantiated (not default empty constructor ?)

removeHypervisorClassFor

public boolean removeHypervisorClassFor(java.lang.String hypervisorType)
Deletes the IHypervisor class implementation for the given type.

Parameters:
hypervisorType - the IHypervisor identifier want to remove.
Returns:
true if success remove an existing IHypervisor class, false if do not exist any IHypervisor class for the given type.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Tests load hypervisor plugin, reload each 10 seconds.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
